text: 4:6 Rom 8:10Bizir kam bagha, Iesus gumazamizir ovengeziba uaghan Akar Aghuim me mɨkɨri. Men ovevem kamaghɨn oto, God me tuisɨghizɨ, me ariaghire, mati gumazamiziba bar kamaghɨn ariaghire. Egh me Godɨn mɨrara, men duaba angamɨra ikiasa, Iesus Akar Aghuim me mɨkɨri.4:6 Grighɨn akam vezɨn kamɨn bizir kam deragha a mɨgeir puvatɨ. Gumazir maba ghaze, a ti 1 Pita 3:19 itir bizir kamra mɨgei, ezɨ me kamaghɨn a gɨra, “Bizir kam bagha Krais Akar Aghuim gumazamizir ovengezibav kɨm. Me gumaziba ariaghiri moghɨn me areme, men arazir kurabar ivezim. Kamaghɨn an Akar Aghuim me mɨkɨni, eghtɨ me ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuir zurara itim iniva, duaba mɨn ikiam, mati God uabɨ.”
